designations.source_description: Edited by Bratton, J H. Published by JNCC, 1991.  Updates the National Review of non-marine Molluscs (1983), using the old IUCN categories and criteria (pre 1994).
designations.reporting_category: Red Listing based on pre 1994 IUCN guidelines
designations.designation_description: Taxa which are no longer known to exist in the wild after repeated searches of their localities and other known likely places.Superseded by new IUCN categories in 1994, but still applicable to lists that have not been reviewed since 1994.
